actions.text: Introduced in the Senate, read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed without amendment by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

official_title: A bill to amend the United States Commission on Civil Rights Act of 1983 to reauthorize the Commission, and for other purposes.
short_title: United States Commission on Civil Rights Reauthorization Act of 1991
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: United States Commission on Civil Rights Reauthorization Act of 1991 - Amends the United States Commission on Civil Rights Act of 1983 to: (1) mandate an annual report to the Congress and the President; (2) authorize appropriations; and (3) extend the termination date of the Act.

titles.title: United States Commission on Civil Rights Reauthorization Act of 1991
A bill to amend the United States Commission on Civil Rights Act of 1983 to reauthorize the Commission, and for other purposes.
